blog.title: ao3feed-BakuDeku
blog.description:
Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

title: Darkness Dominates The Heart
description:
by SileneAlba

“But Midoriya Izuku was never really the person to do what he’s been told.
Since early childhood on, he has been a curios boy, open-minded and highly intelligent with tangled green hair and cute freckles. He could have been a tiny little thing, just as the other children in this innocent time of childhood had it not been for the fact that he, the one who wanted to become a superhero so much, was told he hasn’t got any quirck at all.
And maybe that was the moment where white innocence began to shatter and wings were colored black.”

My try on the Villian!Deku Au.

Words: 2035, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Katsuki
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku
  • Additional Tags: villian au, Slight Shinkami, first fic, Kissing, Dubious Consent, Midoriya being evil, I really don’t know how to tag, nothing graphic

blog.name: dark-and-kawaii-writings
blog.title: Dark And Kawaii Writings
blog.description:
Requests/ Fantasies = CLOSED 
It’s YA Boi Kiwi The Shark Advocate!!!! 
*air horn noises*
Thirsty weeb trash queen that enjoys writing for
 ★ My Hero Academia + Villains ★ Naruto ★

summary: I loooooooooovvve your villainsxfamily stuff! Is there a possibly chance I can request dabi and son angst? I read your villains...
question: I loooooooooovvve your villainsxfamily stuff! Is there a possibly chance I can request dabi and son angst? I read your villains as dads and liked how you wrote dabi with his son and how it can be not so pleasant all the time
answer:
Yes of course!!!!

“The hell did you say?”

“You heard me! You. Suck. Leave.”

“You wanna run that by me one more time you little shit? I brought you into this world and I’ll take your ass out of it.”

“Mom brought me into this world not you, villain!”

Dabi’s bright blue eyes gleamed with rage. He loved his son but he was growing tired of these outbursts and his own son telling him to leave. Not even realizing it, Dabi’s left side began to burn with blue flames as he witnessed his sons right side burn the same color…

“Mom and I are better off without you! It’s not like you’re ever here anyway to actually protect her!”

“I’ve done a lot more than you thi-“

“The last time someone found her she would’ve died if it wasn’t for me coming home from school on time! And the only reason she was attacked was because of your stupid little gang playing league of villains!!”

His sons eyes began to brighten as his wrath continued… his right side burning with such intensity that his clothes started to disintegrate… Dabi’s son was slowly losing control over his quirk… And Dabi knew if he didn’t act fast, his son would end up with the same damaged skin as himself.

“I’ll,” -Dabi’s blue flames subsided- “I’ll leave, just calm your ass down.”

His eyes were full of pain as he said those words… and his son could see it clear as day but it didn’t change his son’s mind. He loathed his father for never being around, and that wasn’t about to change anytime soon. Dabi knew he let his son down and that he had become the parent he never wished to be… But at least he had the balls to walk away and leave the family he created… So they could live in peace.

“Don’t bother waiting to say goodbye to mom, just get out now! Before you cause her more pain!”

Dabi’s body felt heavy… Did you loathe him just as much?

Without another word Dabi took his tattered jacket and left his once home…

Walking through the alleyways, Dabi kept his head low as he wandered through the city… Pondering about whether or not he was just like his shit of an old man…

“Tch.” Clicking his tongue, Dabi raises his head for a brief moment… Has he really failed as a father…. As a lover….?

“(S/N), Dabi, I’m hom-” Stopping in the middle of the doorway, you took a moment to sniff, was Dabi attempting to cook again? It smelt of something burning, mild, but it was there…

“(S/N)? Da-”

“Stop saying his name!”

With a heavy sigh, you closed the front door and lean against it… ‘Again…?’ Sulking for a brief moment, you ponder if Dabi has taken his leave yet or not…. 'Of course he has…’

Propelling yourself off the door, you make your way to your son’s room only to find him holding a pillow in his steamy arms… It was apparent that this argument had gone too far this time…

“Can I come in?”

Nodding his head, your son looked out his window as you sullenly walk towards his bed. Placing yourself on the plush bedding, you didn’t know where to start… Dabi wasn’t around by choice, so you figured you’d start there…

“Your father never wanted to become a villain you know… He’s- …. he’s gone through a lot… and he probably left not because you won the fight, but…” -looking at your son you place your hand on his neck where he had a small burn caused by his intense quirk- “ but because he loves you and wanted to keep you safe.“

Looking away from you, your son’s eyes closed in order to stop himself from releasing a single tear…

"Why are you defending him?!” Smacking away your hand on his neck, your son stood up, his eyes still shut… “Why are you defending such a monster!? He’s never around! He doesn’t love us! He only comes around when he’s bored!! Be honest!!” Swaying his head side to side, clear tears flicked across the room. Your son truly loathed Dabi, and truth be told you couldn’t blame him… Dabi really wasn’t around like a father should be, and when he was around the two would do nothing but compete with one another to see who could take care of you better…

“(S/N)…” -Pulling your son into your chest, you hold him close so he knows its okay to let it all out- “It’s going to be okay, I promise.”

Leaning against a tree, Dabi peers up at the hospital window. As he watches the white haired woman smile and laugh with three others, he too smirks ever so slightly. Fading fast his smirk vanishes, Dabi had taken note how their father was no where to be found… That it was just the mother and her four-… three children…

Is this what yours and his son’s future looked like? It was rare for Dabi to feel much of anything anymore, but in this moment his chest not only felt heavy, but as if his heart was trying to scratch its way out… Gripping onto his white shirt, Dabi knew he needed to head back and make amends before he lost the two of you for good.

It wasnt long before Dabi had found his way back home and just as his heart was nearly steady and calm… A storm had picked back up inside of him as he witnesses your front wooden door cracked with scratches…

Throwing himself inside, Dabi calls out to you and his son.

There’s no reply…

The lights are all off and theres no sign of either one of you… Had he been too late… was this… had he truly lost you both?

Keeling over halfway, Dabi’s trembling hands hold tight on his knees as sweat drips from his forehead… His onxy hair clinging to his face. He was panicking…

Biting his lower lip, he had one last room to check, (s/n)’s room… Struggling for just a moment, Dabi found himself standing tall, his hand ablaze with blue flames….

His sons door had matched the front, open slightly with scratches… There was no going back…

Quietly, Dabi entered his sons room… with his first step, Dabi’s eyes widen…

There on his sons bed, was a white kitten curled up with both his son and you…

Extinguishing his flame, Dabi crept closer to the bed so he too could curl up with the family he had help make. Securely he wrapped his arm around you and his son… Dabi knew that his son would rage the moment he awakened, but Dabi needed to be there… He needed to feel the warmth of his family… And he needed his son to know that he was there to stay.

~ Love Kiwi xoxo

I’m sorry if this isnt my best work (T_T) I’ve been out of the writing game for a hot while

“The hell did you say?”

“You heard me! You. Suck. Leave.”

“You wanna run that by me one more time you little shit? I brought you into this world and I’ll take your ass out of it.”

“Mom brought me into this world not you, villain!”

Dabi’s bright blue eyes gleamed with rage. He loved his son but he was growing tired of these outbursts and his own son telling him to leave. Not even realizing it, Dabi’s left side began to burn with blue flames as he witnessed his sons right side burn the same color…

“Mom and I are better off without you! It’s not like you’re ever here anyway to actually protect her!”

“I’ve done a lot more than you thi-“

“The last time someone found her she would’ve died if it wasn’t for me coming home from school on time! And the only reason she was attacked was because of your stupid little gang playing league of villains!!”

His sons eyes began to brighten as his wrath continued… his right side burning with such intensity that his clothes started to disintegrate… Dabi’s son was slowly losing control over his quirk… And Dabi knew if he didn’t act fast, his son would end up with the same damaged skin as himself.

“I’ll,” -Dabi’s blue flames subsided- “I’ll leave, just calm your ass down.”

His eyes were full of pain as he said those words… and his son could see it clear as day but it didn’t change his son’s mind. He loathed his father for never being around, and that wasn’t about to change anytime soon. Dabi knew he let his son down and that he had become the parent he never wished to be… But at least he had the balls to walk away and leave the family he created… So they could live in peace.

“Don’t bother waiting to say goodbye to mom, just get out now! Before you cause her more pain!”

Dabi’s body felt heavy… Did you loathe him just as much?

Without another word Dabi took his tattered jacket and left his once home…

Walking through the alleyways, Dabi kept his head low as he wandered through the city… Pondering about whether or not he was just like his shit of an old man…

“Tch.” Clicking his tongue, Dabi raises his head for a brief moment… Has he really failed as a father…. As a lover….?

“(S/N), Dabi, I’m hom-” Stopping in the middle of the doorway, you took a moment to sniff, was Dabi attempting to cook again? It smelt of something burning, mild, but it was there…

“(S/N)? Da-”

“Stop saying his name!”

With a heavy sigh, you closed the front door and lean against it… ‘Again…?’ Sulking for a brief moment, you ponder if Dabi has taken his leave yet or not…. 'Of course he has…’

Propelling yourself off the door, you make your way to your son’s room only to find him holding a pillow in his steamy arms… It was apparent that this argument had gone too far this time…

“Can I come in?”

Nodding his head, your son looked out his window as you sullenly walk towards his bed. Placing yourself on the plush bedding, you didn’t know where to start… Dabi wasn’t around by choice, so you figured you’d start there…

“Your father never wanted to become a villain you know… He’s- …. he’s gone through a lot… and he probably left not because you won the fight, but…” -looking at your son you place your hand on his neck where he had a small burn caused by his intense quirk- “ but because he loves you and wanted to keep you safe.“

Looking away from you, your son’s eyes closed in order to stop himself from releasing a single tear…

"Why are you defending him?!” Smacking away your hand on his neck, your son stood up, his eyes still shut… “Why are you defending such a monster!? He’s never around! He doesn’t love us! He only comes around when he’s bored!! Be honest!!” Swaying his head side to side, clear tears flicked across the room. Your son truly loathed Dabi, and truth be told you couldn’t blame him… Dabi really wasn’t around like a father should be, and when he was around the two would do nothing but compete with one another to see who could take care of you better…

“(S/N)…” -Pulling your son into your chest, you hold him close so he knows its okay to let it all out- “It’s going to be okay, I promise.”

Leaning against a tree, Dabi peers up at the hospital window. As he watches the white haired woman smile and laugh with three others, he too smirks ever so slightly. Fading fast his smirk vanishes, Dabi had taken note how their father was no where to be found… That it was just the mother and her four-… three children…

Is this what yours and his son’s future looked like? It was rare for Dabi to feel much of anything anymore, but in this moment his chest not only felt heavy, but as if his heart was trying to scratch its way out… Gripping onto his white shirt, Dabi knew he needed to head back and make amends before he lost the two of you for good.

It wasnt long before Dabi had found his way back home and just as his heart was nearly steady and calm… A storm had picked back up inside of him as he witnesses your front wooden door cracked with scratches…

Throwing himself inside, Dabi calls out to you and his son.

There’s no reply…

The lights are all off and theres no sign of either one of you… Had he been too late… was this… had he truly lost you both?

Keeling over halfway, Dabi’s trembling hands hold tight on his knees as sweat drips from his forehead… His onxy hair clinging to his face. He was panicking…

Biting his lower lip, he had one last room to check, (s/n)’s room… Struggling for just a moment, Dabi found himself standing tall, his hand ablaze with blue flames….

His sons door had matched the front, open slightly with scratches… There was no going back…

Quietly, Dabi entered his sons room… with his first step, Dabi’s eyes widen…

There on his sons bed, was a white kitten curled up with both his son and you…

Extinguishing his flame, Dabi crept closer to the bed so he too could curl up with the family he had help make. Securely he wrapped his arm around you and his son… Dabi knew that his son would rage the moment he awakened, but Dabi needed to be there… He needed to feel the warmth of his family… And he needed his son to know that he was there to stay.

~ Love Kiwi xoxo

I’m sorry if this isnt my best work (T_T) I’ve been out of the writing game for a hot while

summary: could you write some sero/kaminari/reader (poly) with like body worship? not like nsfw just they have an insecure s/o who has...
question: could you write some sero/kaminari/reader (poly) with like body worship? not like nsfw just they have an insecure s/o who has body issues and they flood her with compliments (sorry i keep asking for so much sero/kaminari i just really love your writing :) ). Thanks !
answer:
I love me some body worship

You were standing in front of your mirror and pinching your hips, you felt insecure. You were just in some plain underwear and were about to put on a t-shirt.

“Hey babe” Sero said and wrapped his arms around your shoulders from behind.

Kaminari already had his hands on Sero’s waist.

“Do you guys think I’m beautiful?”

“Why are you even asking, cause obviously yeah” Kaminari stated, sounding a bit baffled.

“Seconded” Sero said and kissed your shoulder.

Sero stayed behind you and Kaminari moved in front of you. Sero kept his hands on your shoulders and Kaminari placed his on your hips.

“You” Sero started, kissing your neck.

“Are” Kaminari continued and kissed your waist

“The most”

“Beautiful”

“Creature”

“In”

“Existence” Sero finished with a kiss on your shoulder.

summary: I LIKE THAT BNHA’S PORTRAYAL OF 15 YEAR OLD CHILDREN IS LIKE, A GOOD 85% ACCURATE
title: I LIKE THAT BNHA’S PORTRAYAL OF 15 YEAR OLD CHILDREN IS LIKE, A GOOD 85% ACCURATE
body:
As a full grown adult who sometimes remembers what it was like to be 15 years old, I can safely say that BNHA captures the experience of being a 15 year old child in a new school with an impressive degree of accuracy. 

Consider the following:

  • school is your whole life; it’s where all of your friends are and informs literally all of your decisions
  • also some of those friends are absolute garbage people but you’ve been with them your whole life so you just kind of deal with it because it’s all you know and it doesn’t occur to you that you have a choice 
  • the fucking drama
    • fucking Shinso coming up on 1A and handing them his little “declaration of war” with absolute dead seriousness BLESS YOUR BABY SOUL 
    • that’s literally just what 15 year olds are like though 
    • SHIT’S LIFE OR DEATH IN HERE MAN IT’S FUCKING WAR   
  • you’re convinced that school is the only avenue to your “dream job”, whatever that may be at the age of 15, and you can’t mentally conceive of any alternative should school not go the way you’re hoping it will
  • literally school just feels like you’ll straight up die every time you suffer any kind of failure or difficulty but because you’re 15 now which is PRACTICALLY AN ADULT you don’t feel like you can ask for help until you’ve lost a fucking leg or something and you’ll put yourself in horrendous mortal danger in order to resolve issues by yourself
  • you genuinely believe that you’re as good as an adult at 15 and that you know everything about life and how to conduct yourself and you put SO MUCH EFFORT into trying to be THE BIG MAN 
    • I’m sorry but you are a child 
    • you are literally still a tiny baby child and it is so funny 
  • still thinking that the shit you learn in your lessons is going to matter for dick after you graduate and leave school 
  • so many fucking fish being judged on their ability to climb a tree, holy shit 

Like, I could go on but so much of the shit I see in BNHA is just like, yeah, you know, it felt like that when I was 15. It’s easy to say that it’s dumb plot device shit that nobody ever asks for help with anything and that these kids are all getting into like, really, genuinely dangerous shenanigans by themselves but it’s just like that when you’re 15 years old. 

Bless BNHA. Such a good fucking series.

body:
six. whole. entire. hours.

I’m not used to this lmao

But here he is!! Villain lad. V good.

Again, this is a gift for my friend on Twitter! You can see more about his Villain Present Mic AU here

I messed up at one point so the quality might be a little gross but!! It’s done :D
